fitnessApp

Class dbConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • fitnessApp.dbConnection
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    accountInfo, active, activity, meals, stepsTable, users, weight

    public class dbConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    This class extends the dbConnection class to connect to the AccountInfo Table in the database
    Version:
    12/5/18
    Author:
    Carson Uecker-Herman
